body.name: Luxury Bidet Sprayer for Toilet-Handheld Sprayer Attachment with Brass Leak Free T-Valve&Adjustable Jet Spray, Perfect for Feminine Hygiene
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 8 mins
features: 【UPGRADE PREMIUM QUALITY TOILET WATER SPRAYER 】This bidet sprayer for toilet consists of a high-quality 304 stainless steel bidet nozzle, a stainless steel hose and a brass T-valve that resistant to corrosion and corrosion. Also finish treated with highly anti-rust chrome polished to make this bum gun more non-corrosive, fingerprints and easy to clean.Really better protect your sanitation

【MULTIPLE USES MEET YOUR NEED】Pugrwei black handheld bidet sprayer is great suitable for the whole family, especially for anyone with limited mobility due to surgery, arthritis, postpartum or injuries, ideal for elderly adults, can be used as a cloth diaper sprayer, bathroom cleaning and even for pet washing, meet all kinds of your need, I believe you will fall love with it when you get it!

【ADJUSTABLE WATER PRESSURE DESIGN】The water pressure can be adjusted by the handheld bidet sprayer lever. Press lever gently to get soft spray to do personal cleaning, especially an ideal choice for women during pregnancy and menstrual cycles. Press lever deepest to get jet spray to wash baby cloth diaper or clean your toilet, help improve your family cleaning quality

【SUPER EASY INSTALLATION & DIY FRIENDLY】Connect your handheld bidet set with no need for wrenches, other tools, or professional plumbing help. The toilet bidet sprayer can be installed less than 10 minutes without any professional help. You will surprise by the easy and convenient of our handheld bidet sprayer set and can't help loving it.All parts are included, also with detailed instructions
【COMPLETE AFTER SALES SUPPORT】 If you have any questions, please contact us through Amazon Supports. We will solve the problem for you within 24 hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, looks great.
reviews.reviewText: No issues with installation. No issues with leaks. We were looking for something matte black to match the aesthetic in our bathroom and this fit the bill. It's very easy to control the water pressure by squeezing the trigger with less or more force. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to install in general. Then we read that you need to shut off the valve every time when not used, so we had to install an extra mechanism as you can't be turning the regular toilet valve. That was a little more complicated but no problem either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I dodn't know what softness means, and there is no temperature control on this as far as I know
reviews.reviewText: It works well for the reason I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Worked great with a small leak that went away over time. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent material and great pressure
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was actually expecting some sort of malleable plastic but I am surprised about the material iban very good way, it feels strong as it it were copper. Looks very minimalistic and fancy and it was extremely easy to install. I am grateful that it had both, the “hang from toilet” and “ attach to wall” options because my toilet did not allow the hang up modality. Provides very good water pressure and you can actually control it by the pressure you apply to the little pry. I am very pleased and certainly works better than the previous model I had, which was the one attached to the toilet seat, that kind ultimately damaged my seat hinges and I was forced to buy a new one. Will but it in the future for the guest bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved in Thailand these are a must
reviews.reviewText: So, my family returned from Thailand and this was the first Amazon purchase my husband made. We had to have the “butt sprayers” that you must use while living in Thailand. I will say these cut down on the toilet paper usage as you begin with a clean (or cleaner depending on how well your aim is) surface. Super easy to install. No need for anything special and it comes with a little mounting handle that goes right over the back tank under the lid. They’re clean and we have had guests use them! They are also discreet and we have had others not even notice them. I’ve never liked the other style bidet systems as it feels like they are just dirty and when I have gone to someone’s home I wonder how well they clean this extra remote thing attached to their toilet. These aren’t like that at all. Go for this style “butt sprayer” you won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product, easy to install, and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and love the ease of using it. It’s fantastic. No leakage and great spray intensity. Easy to manage the force of spray.
